text: (Muhammad) sira nyaritakna nalikane Ingsun nekakake sak rombongan jin ngrungokake anggonira maca al-Quran Bareng Jin mau wis ngrungokake padha kondha, "Para kancaku padha menenga ngrungokna unine al-Quran iki". Bareng wis rampung pamacane, jin mau bali marang panggonane banjur mulang al-Quran marang kancane
